org.fhaes.util

Class FHCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhaes.util.FHCluster

  • public class FHCluster
extends java.lang.Object
    FHCluster Class. Combine files into groups based upon the distance threshold specified in the preferences.
    Author:
    Peter Brewer
